page.title: 16CURRIE TAKEAWAY SHOP
page.content: A child can go into the local chip shop with confidence, because of the friendly service. The chips are excellent and so are the sausages, white puddings, black puddings, haggises, pizzas, chickens and other things, so it has a very good variety. Although small, it appears to attract many customers. Other than chips it sells a large variety of sweets, such as Mars Bars and Polos. It also has a wide range of refreshments, one of which is Quatro. Its prices are very competitive. Personally I think that it is in a very good area, because people travelling through Juniper Green can stop and buy some chips and catch up on the latest news from the shop's television. Sometimes too much salt and sauce is given, but all in all it is a very good chip shop.
